messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Parental Rights Re: Intro
messages.msgSnippet: YES!!!!!  (Not yelling at you Nicki -- just agreeing with Jane). You have the right to direct the education of your child.  At home, in school, everywhere.
messages.messageBody:
YES!!!!! (Not yelling at you Nicki -- just agreeing with Jane).

You have the right to direct the education of your child. At home, in
school, everywhere.

They work for you.

Nance


In a message dated 05/29/2001 3:42:06 AM !!!First Boot!!!,
jforgey@... writes:


> I am absolutely amazed that most people assume they have no rights in
> schools. I guess it's part of the brainwashing still working in
> adulthood. Every parent should be able to stand up for what they
> believe is right for their child.
>
> Hang in there, hold your head high and speak your mind. What possible
> harm can that teacher do to you? Ask you to take your son out of
> school? Gladly!
>
> Jane
>
>
>




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
